title: Minecraft Java版 19w08a 发布
author: SPGoding
txt_content:
本帖最后由 SPGoding 于 2019-2-21 22:22 编辑 
每周快照是Minecraft的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
然而，每周快照主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。 适用于正式版的Mod不兼容快照，且大多数Mod都不对每周快照提供支持。
Minecraft 1.14 仍未发布，19w08a 为其第 22 个预览版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。



Minecraft Snapshot 19w08a
A Village & Pillage Java Snapshot
Minecraft 快照 19w08a
一个村庄与掠夺 Java 快照

We're slowly entering the "bug fixing and polishing" phase of the 1.14 Village & Pillage update, but that didn't stop us from sneaking in a few cool features like Leather Horse Armor (it's dyeable!), making Invisiblity Potions actually useful in survival, and best of all... wait, oh dear, I've forgotten what that last thing was. Oh well, it'll come to me later.我们已经逐渐进入了 1.14 村庄与掠夺更新的「漏洞修复与打磨」阶段，但这并不能阻止我们加入酷炫的新特性，比如皮革马铠（可以染色！）、让隐身药水在生存模式下真正有用，以及最棒的…嗯，等等，我忘了那是啥了。等我想起来再说吧。

CHANGES IN 19W08A
19W08A 的改动

One Iron Golem now spawns in all villages upon generationImprovements to invisibility to allow it to correctly work in many cases where it didn't but you'd expect it toAdded Leather Horse ArmorTextures for potion effects are now split into individual filesCommand parser now accepts ' as string quotes. Inside '-quoted string " is handled as normal character and requires no escaping (and vice-versa) - so now it's easier to input text components in NBT.Stopped foxes, dolphins, and pandas from having armor equipped onto them via dispenserChanged bounding box and eye height of foxes (prevents them from drowning when swimming)Foxes that trusted you in the previous snapshot will unfortunately no longer be trusting生成村庄时所有村庄都会有一个铁傀儡改进了隐身效果，使其能够做到过去很多你认为它能够做到但它其实做不到的事情添加皮革马铠药水效果的材质分割到了单独文件命令解析器现在允许用 ' 括住字符串。在 ' 里面，" 会被当成普通字符，不需要转义（反之亦然）——所以现在想在 NBT 里面写 JSON Component 简单多了！阻止发射器给狐狸、海豚和熊猫戴上盔甲调整狐狸的碰撞箱和眼睛高度（防止其游泳时溺水）很遗憾，在上一个快照里信任你的狐狸背叛了你

LEATHER HORSE ARMOR
皮革马铠

Added a new armor type for horses添加了新的马铠Dye it in lots, yes LOTS, of different colors用非常多——没错，非常多——的染料给它染色

FIXED BUGS IN 19W08A
19W08A 中的漏洞修复

MC-10901 - Various mobs can see invisible playersMC-10901 - 生物能够看到隐身玩家MC-64581 - Game freezes a couple of seconds when changing mipmap level parameterMC-64581 - 改变 MipMap 等级时会导致游戏卡顿几秒MC-68563 - Barrier particles display random textures when switching resource packsMC-68563 - 切换资源包时，屏障粒子会显示随机材质。MC-79320 - Invisible villagers and wandering traders can be seen by zombiesMC-79320 - 隐身村民与流浪商人会被僵尸看到。MC-106430 - "Glowing" shader not reloaded on resource pack reloadMC-106430 - "Glowing" 着色器不会在资源包重载时重载MC-116969 - Mobs look at invisible mobs / playersMC-116969 - 生物看向隐身生物/玩家MC-129855 - Turtle egg block model has stretched textureMC-129855 - 海龟蛋模型有着拉伸过的材质MC-130564 - Server resource packs can brick the client for up to minutes!MC-130564 - 服务器资源包可以让客户端卡几分钟！MC-131368 - Snow golems attack invisible mobsMC-131368 - 雪傀儡攻击隐身生物MC-134625 - Tesselating liquid in world - NullPointerExceptionMC-134625 - Tesselating liquid in world - NullPointerException（译注：崩溃报告原文）MC-137009 - Shulker Detection Range Incorrect for invisible targetsMC-137009 - 潜影贝对隐身目标的探测区域不正确MC-137722 - Smooth quartz blocks do not use the proper "smooth" textureMC-137722 - 平滑石英块没有使用正确的「平滑」材质MC-137841 - Villagers don't run away from ravagersMC-137841 - 村民不躲避劫掠兽MC-138022 - Wither roses can be placed on unusual blocks like hoppersMC-138022 - 凋零玫瑰可以被放在奇怪的方块上，比如漏斗MC-143398 - Recalibrated the connection to the bovine planeMC-143398 - 重新调整了和牛位面的连接方式MC-138558 - Cats and ocelots run away from players in creative modeMC-138558 - 猫和豹猫躲避创造模式的玩家MC-139739 - Bad Omen's icon is bugged in Programmer ArtMC-139739 - 使用 Programmer Art 资源包时，不祥之兆的图标有问题MC-140379 - New village church stained window is one block lowerMC-140379 - 新村庄教堂的染色玻璃低了一格MC-140676 - Sweet berry bush do not burnMC-140676 -  甜浆果丛不会燃烧MC-141318 - Server crashes when an arrow, which has a non-vanilla sound event in it's SoundEvent tag, hit a block or mobMC-141318 - SoundEvent 中定义了非原版音效的箭击中方块或生物会导致服务端爆炸MC-141911 - Fire charges cannot ignite campfiresMC-141911 - 火球不能点燃营火MC-141987 - Splash water bottle does not extinguish campfireMC-141987 - 喷溅水瓶不会熄灭营火MC-142850 - Baby pandas never spawn naturallyMC-142850 - 不会自然生成幼儿熊猫MC-143983 - Mojang logo can be changed using texture packMC-143983 - Mojang LOGO 能够被材质包（译注：资源包）改变MC-144080 - Clicking anywhere in "Video Settings..." play's the click soundMC-144080 - 在 "视频设置..." 里随便点都会出点击音效MC-144083 - Cannot drag slider in OptionsMC-144083 - 选项中不能拖动滑块儿MC-144092 - Fox offspring don't trust the playerMC-144092 - 狐狸后代不信任玩家MC-144142 - Foxes take and eat things while sleepingMC-144142 - 狐狸睡觉的时候也会捡东西吃MC-144161 - Warning on game startup: "File minecraft:sounds/mob/fox/bark5.ogg does not exist, cannot add it to event minecraft:entity.fox.bark"MC-144161 - 游戏启动时警告："File minecraft:sounds/mob/fox/bark5.ogg does not exist, cannot add it to event minecraft:entity.fox.bark"




官方服务端下载地址https://launcher.mojang.com/v1/objects/f337f8dfb765f152388d5038a6e0e8830782e5ed/server.jar

正版启动器下载地址Windowshttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/MinecraftInstaller.msiMac/OSXhttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/Minecraft.dmgLinux/Otherhttp://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraft.Download/launcher/Minecraft.jar
关于本次更新的详细内容，请关注稍后 Minecraft 1.14（村庄与掠夺更新）特性列表 的更新。
预览版的下载方式以及运行说明对于正版用户官方启动器是跟进最及时、运行最稳定的启动器，每次启动均会自动检查并下载启动器最新版本。但由于亚马逊服务器https连接在国内时常不稳定，官方启动器下载游戏可能需要魔法上网。启动器在上文已经提供。适用于全平台。对于非正版用户非正版用户完全可以体验预览版本，请于推荐启动器列表寻找合适的启动器。目前绝大多数主流启动器都带有游戏下载功能。如有仍疑惑请到原版问答板块提问。

外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪
Minecraft官网（内容英文）Jeb的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Dinnerbone的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Grum的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Searge的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）Minecraft博客（英文）英语 Minecraft Wiki的Version history页面（英文，更新条目详细，较及时）中文 Minecraft Wiki的版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细）
